newsitem.title: CHINA: TOPSTYLE YEARLY NET LOSS HK$63.82 MLN.
newsitem.headline: TOPSTYLE YEARLY NET LOSS HK$63.82 MLN.

text.p: Exceptional items 7.36 loss vs 4.19 loss (see note)
Company name Topstyle International Holdings Ltd
NOTE - Topstyle International is a silk garment maker.

The operating loss of 1995/96 had been reclassified. The operating loss of HK$3.91 million in 1996 resulted from the printing and dyeing operations in 1995/96 had been included in discontinued operations in the corresponding period of 1996 as those operations had been considered as discontinued operation in 1996/97.
Accordingly the exceptional loss on the redundant fixed assets of HK$7.19 million in 1996 had also been reclassified and included in discontinued operations.
Net is after an exceptional loss of HK$5.46 million on stock provisions and loss of HK$1.90 million on provisions for diminution in value of unlisted investments.
Total dividend for year is nil vs nil.
